Become a Member

Art Center membership can get you free admission to hundreds of museums, nationwide! The Art Center has served as one of the Grand Valley's most valuable cultural resources for over 50 years. We have grown and thrived over the years because of people like you.

Become a member today »

Volunteer

Join in the fun and serve as a volunteer at The Art Center! There are a variety of activities and programs, hours of service and days of the week that are the perfect combination for you and The Art Center. Help us out.

Sign-up to volunteer »

Visit

The Art Center is considered a home and social hub for Western Slope artists and the art-curious. The five galleries host work by national artists and also feature the range and talent of our own Western Colorado community.

Come visit your art center »

News and Announcements

Sinners & Saints Date Change
Tuesday, January 6, 2026 - 14:57
The Center Stage Concert Series performance by Sinners & Saints will now take place on January 30 at 7:30 PM.
Call for Artists: Contemporary Clay 2026
Saturday, November 15, 2025 - 11:57
Now accepting entries for the biennial juried exhibition of contemporary ceramic art! Submissions January 23, 2026.
Call for Artists: The Ron Beckman Art Center Members' Exhibition 2026
Saturday, November 15, 2025 - 11:18
Now accepting submissions from all Art Center members! Online submissions due by February 3. In-person submission February 3, 10:00am-1:00pm.
View all news

Due to the COVID-19 situation, The Art Center is temporarily closed. We will be opening on a limited-access basis beginning June 5!
Thank you for your patience and continued support.

Upcoming Events

Jan 30
Center Stage Concert Series: Sinners & Saints
Join us for an evening of live music as we kick off the Center Stage Concert Series!
Feb 06
February First Friday
Celebrate art, community, and our largest exhibition of the year.
Feb 07 – Feb 11
Let the Good Times Roll: New Orleans
The Art Center visits New Orleans in February 2026!
Feb 14
Sing a Song of Valentine's: A Night of Music, Love, and Story
Secure your spot for Grand Junction’s most artful Valentine’s Day event!
Feb 28
Center Stage Concert Series: Jeneve Rose (February 28)
Enjoy an evening of live music with Jeneve Rose as part of the Center Stage Concert Series!
Mar 27 – Mar 28
Hot Times in Glenwood Springs
The Art Center’s journey will include a tour of downtown, an evening at the Venue Revue, and a night at Hotel Colorado.
View all

Members enjoy these great benefits:

  • Discounts on classes for children and adults
  • Access to our excursions program
  • Discounts on most Gift Shop items
  • Invitations to members’ events
  • Art Center newsletter and postcards
  • Eligibility for our annual Members Exhibit
  • Supporting the arts in your community

The Art Center of Western Colorado is a regional arts organization dedicated to enriching lives by promoting the enjoyment and understanding of the arts.
